projects.title: Serbia Rentals
projects.description: Serbia Rentals is a web application designed to connect users with rental properties across Serbia. It allows users to browse available listings, view property details, save their favorite properties, and contact property owners. Property owners can list their properties, upload images, and manage their listings.

projects.title: MovieVault
projects.description: MovieVault is a feature-rich web application for movie enthusiasts. It allows users to discover, rate, review and discuss movies and TV shows. The platform combines personal curation with community interaction, featuring detailed media information, user reviews, watchlists, real-time discussions, and an AI-powered movie assistant for personalized recommendations and insights.

projects.title: Chess Buddy
projects.description: Chess Buddy is a web application designed to connect chess players locally. It allows users to find nearby players on a map, view their profiles, and engage in real-time chat conversations.

projects.title: Chess Notation Helper
projects.description: Chess Notation Helper is a Chrome extension designed to accelerate the learning process for algebraic chess notation. It automatically detects moves made during online games on Lichess.org and Chess.com and briefly highlights the 'landing'' squares on the board. This real-time visual feedback helps users connect the abstract notation to the physical board, improving recognition and understanding without disrupting gameplay.

projects.title: YT Trackback
projects.description: YT Trackback is a Chrome extension that helps you recover lost videos from your YouTube playlists. Scan any playlist for unavailable (deleted, private, or region-blocked) videos, and attempt to recover their original titles using the Internet Archive. Features include a simple popup UI, real-time progress updates, and privacy-first local processing. Built for YouTube curators who want to preserve the integrity of their playlists.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website entirely built using fundamental web technologies: semantic HTML, CSS Custom Properties for theming, Flexbox/Grid for layout, media queries for responsiveness, and vanilla JavaScript for dynamic content rendering (from JSON), event handling (carousel, menu, theme), and scroll-triggered animations (IntersectionObserver).
